Ruzan Sasuri
Software Engineer | Security Initiatives | Performance Optimization
San Francisco, California, United States
Summary
A Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience building,
testing and maintaining product features. I am also an avid gamer
and like to build fun side projects. Please visit my website https://
ruzansasuri.com to see some of my work.
Experience
F5 Networks
Software Engineer
March 2019 - December 2024 (5 years 10 months)
Remote
- Led full-stack development for customer-facing features on a large-scale
platform, working with product, UX/UI, and engineering teams to deliver
scalable solutions. Developed a multi-provider VM provisioning feature and
mentored junior developers to enhance productivity and foster a collaborative
environment.
- Implemented caching mechanisms to reduce load times of schema-
generated pages from 60 seconds to 2 seconds, significantly improving user
experience and system performance.
- Contributed to security initiatives as part of the Security Ninjas program,
writing and reviewing Threat Model Assessments for new and existing
features, enhancing product security by identifying and addressing
vulnerabilities during the design phase, reducing the risk of post-release
security flaws.
- Improved testing efficiency and collaboration by integrating Cypress into CI/
CD pipelines for automated UI testing, increasing test coverage, and reducing
manual QA efforts, while also promoting Test-Driven Development (TDD)
and mob-programming practices to reduce post-release defects by 30% and
accelerate development cycles.
Accenture
Software Engineering Analyst
November 2013 - April 2016 (2 years 6 months)
Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
  Page 1 of 2

- Deployment and creation of scripts (Perl and Shell) in order to enhance the
automation process and help with disaster recovery in case of a server failure.
- Major focus on automation of various aspects of U2L (Unix to Linux)
migration, including transferring configuration files and binaries using Shell and
Perl scripts.
- Used Perl/CGI, HTML, CSS and Javascript to create web pages to help read
server data on a web page.

Rochester Institute of Technology

Ruzan  Sasuri        San  Francisco,  CA   |  (585)  355-6146  |   ruzansasuri@gmail.com |  ruzansasuri.com  
Dear  Hiring  Manager,  
As  a  software  engineer  with  over  five  years  of  experience  at  a  leading  enterprise  technology  company,  F5  
Networks,
 
I
 
have
 
developed
 
a
 
deep
 
technical
 
skill
 
set
 
with
 
a
 
focus
 
on
 
delivering
 
innovative,
 
high-impact
 
solutions
 
in
 
customer-facing
 
environments.
 
During  my  tenure  at  F5,  I  played  a  key  role  in  the  company's  strategic  security  initiatives.  I  volunteered  to  take  
on
 
the
 
critical
 
task
 
of
 
reviewing
 
design
 
documentation,
 
helping
 
to
 
identify
 
and
 
address
 
security
 
vulnerabilities
 
early
 
in
 
the
 
development
 
process—a
 
proactive
 
approach
 
that
 
significantly
 
reduced
 
long-term
 
costs
 
and
 
minimized
 
the
 
risk
 
of
 
rework.
 
My
 
contributions
 
in
 
this
 
capacity
 
directly
 
supported
 
the
 
integrity
 
of
 
F5’s
 
products
 
and
 
reinforced
 
my
 
commitment
 
to
 
building
 
secure,
 
scalable
 
software
 
from
 
the
 
ground
 
up.
 
Beyond  development,  I  have  consistently  demonstrated  a  passion  for  user-centric  design.  As  an  active  
participant
 
in
 
F5’s
 
customer
 
engagement
 
program,
 
I
 
regularly
 
interfaced
 
with
 
end
 
users
 
to
 
gather
 
actionable
 
insights.
 
These
 
conversations
 
often
 
revealed
 
unexpected
 
usage
 
patterns,
 
which
 
informed
 
subsequent
 
iterations
 
of
 
our
 
features
 
and
 
allowed
 
us
 
to
 
better
 
anticipate
 
user
 
needs.
 
 
I
 
strongly
 
believe
 
in
 
collaboration
 
and
 
continuous
 
learning.
 
I
 
thrive
 
in
 
dynamic
 
environments
 
where
 
I
 
can
 
exchange
 
ideas
 
with
 
peers,
 
support
 
those
 
who
 
may
 
need
 
guidance,
 
and
 
incorporate
 
new
 
technologies
 
to
 
enhance
 
both
 
product
 
functionality
 
and
 
development
 
workflows.
 
Whether
 
through
 
writing
 
productivity-boosting
 
tools,
 
optimizing
 
debugging
 
processes,
 
or
 
simplifying
 
communication
 
within
 
cross-functional
 
teams,
 
I
 
am
 
driven
 
to
 
improve
 
efficiency
 
and
 
effectiveness
 
in
 
my
 
work.
 
Outside  of  my  primary  role,  I  dedicate  time  to  side  projects  that  showcase  both  my  technical  capabilities  and  
my
 
enthusiasm
 
for
 
solving
 
complex
 
problems.
 
A
 
selection
 
of
 
this
 
work
 
is
 
available
 
in
 
my
 
portfolio
 
at
 ruzansasuri.com.  
Thank  you  for  considering  my  profile.  I  would  be  thrilled  to  further  discuss  how  my  skills  and  experience  can  
contribute
 
to
 
the
 
success
 
of
 
your
 
team.
 
I
 
look
 
forward
 
to
 
the
 
possibility
 
of
 
working
 
together.
 
Sincerely,  
Ruzan
 
Sasuri
